adhika rudhira pidanaya sandaha nisi prathikara nokalahoth hadisi hrudayabadha athiwimata saha hruda akarmanyathawa, wakugadu akriyawima, anshabhagaya saha das andawima wani barapathala rogawalata goduru wiya hakiya.adhika rudhira pidanaya athayi handuna gath wita ee sandaha laba dena aushadha waidyawarayage upades paridi nokadawa laba gatha yuthuya.

– oba kawuda kiya mama danne natha namuth me kiyana dewal walin yudda bima paththa palathakawath nogiya, aarakshaka ansha wala sewaya karana kisidu kenek nandunana bawa peni yayi koti thrasthawadin gam bim walata panala minissu kathi gana kota, lama lapatinge kakul keti walin allala gas wala gahana kota witharak neweyi hamudawe aya bomba walata ahuwena warayak gane kumak ho demala gammanayakata pana samulagathanaya ho aduma tharame ehi sitina tharuna pirimi marapu bawawath danne nathi hadayi depaththema thrasthwadin danduwam kare depaththema inna ahinsakayinta kabathi gollawe pawul pitina marapu welawe, di. es. eke bes bol tim eka marapu welawe mama kalapana kare maranna oonama nam me hora palakayan saha me sinhala apage witharak ratayi kiyamin yuddeta para kapana sinhala jathiwadin nomara ahinsaka minissu marane ayi kiyala ewagema gammana walata panala demala siwil wasiyan marana kotath mama kalpana kare gediya pitin illala yuddeta para kapapu demala jathiwadin yahathin iddi me minissu maranne ayi kiyala (jathiwadin wath ,palakayanwath marana eka mama anumatha karanne na – minissu maruwata prashna wisadenne na kiyala mama igenagaththe premadasage maranayen passe ) hamudawata banduna duppath kollanta me hora thakkadi jathiwadenge tharama theruna eka nam godak watinawa – nikamata muna gahunama katha karala balannako palu yanna banina widiya ahaganna thama ee golla uthure awwata karawewi, wassta themi themi wahallu wage kala kapaddi apen ekeki me minisa kiyapu un meheta wela sapa ganna widiya daka ganna labuna ekath hondayi pota waradimen hari prabakaran saha ohuge daru pawula marum kanna lankawe hitiya waradilawath apita oya santhasiya unanam ape lokkange mayil gahakwath allaganna wenawa boruya hansiputu deshapremin kiyana surangana katha walata hu miti thiyana un ee ganath kalapanna karoth hondayi manushiya meheyume manushiya bawa eke senpathiya karala thiyana daha jara wadawalinma hitha ganna puluwan – mama nam neweyi kiyanne me wassaka gana kiyana malliyagenma thamayi eeka ahaganna oona ee unda ge jarawadawalata prabakaran undatawath lan wenna ba wage yudden bata kapu duppath minissu yudde dinala iwara karapu eka gana sathutu wenakota, dakune hansi putu wala hitapu kadbord sama wadiyo pampori gahanawa yudde yudden iwara nowi samen iwara wuna nan hondayi kiyala.
